comments.content:
Hello... I've just wandered into these forums myself (and am a copywriter with an unhealthy fascination with type).   
   
Designing one's own seems like such a massive undertaking, I'm impressed with just the idea of doing it... can't wait to see yours,too!

All german speakers should also have a look to the following german type forums:   
   
www.typeforum.de   
www.typografie.info   
   
Grüße aus Cottbus!
Welcome! We'll hope to see your work in the critique.

The excellent book _Typo_ Friedl, Ott and Stein is a generously-sized encyclopaedia in French, English and German parallel text. Also available is Huib van Krimpen and Rob van de Elzen's _Grafischzakboek_ with main text in Dutch and terms/headings translated into English, German, Italian and Spanish. Neither of these may be exactly what you want, but they may prove helpful, and both are very fine books.
